title: Avoiding Chronic Pain for Good
description:
Jillian’s quarantine, pop culture check in: what we’re watching, reading and doing to pass the time. Plus, what’s really causing your aches and pains; you might want to try immersing yourself in nature to help your body and your mind.

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
